page.title: 01Lochranza nd Glen Esan
page.content: Lochranza and Glen Esan form the centre of this block. Lochranza village lies eiter side of Sea Loch and steep sided Glen with burn down centre. Hills are rough bracken and gorse covered. Sheep and wild red deer graze hills, Meall Mor is higest hill at 496 mts. Loch used for pleasure crft nd the odd fishing smack. Tourism forms main employer. Cattle in Loch, rare plaants, geology, animls and crafts fill torust time. Ferry to Kintyre and field study centre also important local draws. Good access to peaks or Arran via Glen EAsan on foot. Most crofts now holiday homes. Nearest school pirnmill. St birdes is churc of Scotland. Bus service round Arran runs through post office. Two hotels, youth hostel, guest houses, cycle hire, spinner and weavers, nature centre camp sites, golf courses
